Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Mishira
Reviews.Content: The hotel has a direct beach access with the free folding umbrellas and reclining chairs. This is a family run hotel, so they really treat their guests as close relatives. Any issues were fixed at no time. It is few minutes away from the shopping strip with excellent bars and restaurants. We enjoyed the breakfast at the swimming pool terrace with a view to Adriatic Sea. BTW, the breakfast was the best we ever have at any hotel through our entire trip. Just few suggestions: Wi-Fi Internet should be available at any room, not just in the lobby; free bikes should be renewed. I'm going to recommend this hotel to all my friends, and we will definitely come back in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and great food”
Reviews.Author: JanetWakefield
Reviews.Content: myself and six female friends stayed at this lovely hotel on the beach for 4 nights for a birthday celebration, the staff were lovely and the food was great and the desserts to die for, the only downside was the rooms and bathrooms were quite small having said that they were clean, we had a side seaview which was quite nice, the location is great, quite central, all 7 of us would gladley stay here again, we had a discrepancy with our bill which we did not realise until we got back to england, we emailed them on our return and they promptly sent us the difference, which was really good of them, we had a day in venice (great day)and was late back, but they told us to go into restaurant for our evening meal, no problem. The pool area is great.can not wait to return

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT POSITION BUT ROOM AND BATHROOM QUITE SMALL”
Reviews.Author: 670523Claudia
Reviews.Content: Clean, perfect position, but room and bathroom too small - we are not so fat I'am 1,60mt tall and my Husband about 1,75mt x 75kg, but we cannot go inside bathroom at the same time - shower was too small even for me...and it was a lateral sea view room !! Perfect price/quality.

Reviews.Title: “a wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: MaibeMaibe
Reviews.Content: This place should have more than three stars. It is a beautiful place on earth, with a fantastic, helpful and friendly family. We felt wery welcome and taken care of. The room we got was large and with a fantastic view, and a great terrasse. The lounge was cool and relaxing. The breakfast was delicios and the poolarea so clean and nice. The beach was just outside of the poolarea, with private sunbeds. To bad the weather was not the best. But its a short trip to Venice (half an hour bus and half an hour boat).
